name: Sparkling Knight
description: A brave knight who shines under any battle.

name: Iron Vanguard
description: A steadfast foot soldier whose armor bears the scars of countless wars.

name: Emerald Squire
description: An eager young warrior learning the ways of chivalry.

name: Flame Archer
description: Shoots burning arrows with deadly precision.

name: Moon Priestess
description: Draws power from the light of the full moon.

name: Thunder Dragon
description: A creature forged from storms and lightning.

name: Celestial Emperor
description: Ruler of heavens, embodiment of cosmic balance.

name: Monkey D. Luffy
description: Captain of the Straw Hat Pirates
